bot.welcome:
ü§ñ Welcome to {bot_name}!

{description}

Commands:
/help - Show this help message
/new - Start a new conversation
/clear - Clear current conversation
/history - Show recent conversations
/logout - Log out and re-authenticate

Just send me a message to start chatting!
bot.welcome_no_desc:
ü§ñ Welcome to {bot_name}!

I am your AI assistant powered by Dify.

Commands:
/help - Show this help message
/new - Start a new conversation
/clear - Clear current conversation
/history - Show recent conversations
/logout - Log out and re-authenticate

Just send me a message to start chatting!
bot.new_conversation: ‚ú® Started a new conversation. Send me your message!

bot.nothing_to_clear: Nothing to clear. You're already fresh ‚ú®

bot.file_upload_disabled: File uploads are disabled for this bot.
